II.ii.2.A.1.a
.
VBMS New Mail Indicator
When new evidence or correspondence is uploaded into a claimant’s electronic claims folder (eFolder), an icon representing a new envelope will appear in the NEW MAIL column of the work queue and eFolder.
This icon, hereafter referred to as the “new mail indicator,” should be cleared on all documents upon completion of initial development.  All subsequent new documents should be opened and reviewed for relevant information.  This action should be completed by any employee handling the eFolder.
Example
:
Note
:
The new mail indicator may be cleared on multiple documents by first selecting each document and choosing the
Mark as Open
option in the ACTIONS drop-down menu.
Reference
:  For more information on the Veterans Benefits Management System (VBMS) new mail indicator, see the
VBMS Core User Guide
.
